SEARCH
Package util

Class AppointmentManager

java.lang.Object
util.AppointmentManager
public class AppointmentManager extends Object
Manages appointment scheduling, storage, and retrieval in the system. Handles loading, saving, and validating appointment data, as well as managing available slots.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public boolean scheduleAppointment(String patientId, String doctorId, LocalDateTime dateTime, String type)
      Schedules an appointment if the slot is available.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor
      dateTime - the date and time of the appointment
      type - the type of appointment
      Returns:
      true if the appointment is scheduled successfully, false otherwise
